Uses of Package
nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental

  • Packages that use nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon
    This package contains the most important classes for the Neon Library and is the root package for all the other Neon packages except for the example implementation.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text
    Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental
    Some poorly-annotated code generated by the JogAmp community for text rendering in JOGL.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental used by nl.esciencecenter.neon 
    Class and Description
    Font
    Interface wrapper for font implementation.

    Class and Description
    Font
    Interface wrapper for font implementation.
    Font.Glyph
    Glyph for font
    Font.Metrics
    Metrics for font Depending on the font's direction, horizontal or vertical, the following tables shall be used: Vertical http://developer.apple.com/fonts/TTRefMan/RM06/Chap6vhea.html Horizontal http://developer.apple.com/fonts/TTRefMan/RM06/Chap6hhea.html
    FontInt 
    FontInt.Glyph 
    FontSet

    OutlineShape
    A Generic shape objects which is defined by a list of Outlines.
    OutlineShape.VerticesState
    Outline's vertices have undefined state until transformed.
